Description.description: List of all the nominations submitted from the canvas app
Unique identifier of the user who created the record.
Date and time when the record was created.
Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the record.
Sequence number of the import that created this record.
Unique identifier of the user who modified the record.
Date and time when the record was modified.
Unique identifier of the delegate user who modified the record.
Group for this nomination
Primary name of the nomination
Unique identifier for entity instances
Employee being nominated
Calculated field with the name of the employee that was nominated
Nominator's case for the nomination.
Admin that reviewed this nomination
Date this nomination was reviewed on
Notes by those who reviewed the nomination and decided whether to award it or not.
Large text block of search terms related to the nomination to aid in search features.
User that submitted the nomination
Calculated field with the name of the person that submitted the nomination
Whether this is a nomination for a single individual, user-defined group, or pre-defined group.
Date and time that the record was migrated.
Owner Id
Unique identifier for the business unit that owns the record
Unique identifier for the team that owns the record.
Unique identifier for the user that owns the record.
Status of the Nomination
Status of the Nomination
Reason for the status of the Nomination
Reason for the status of the Nomination
For internal use only.
Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.
